resources.string: 1- On the To Do List page, you can see what you have saved before. Clicking on the trash will delete the current data. If you press and hold for a long time, you can add the selected task to the finished section.
2- You can add a new to do list on the Add To Do List page.
3- On the Finished List page, you can see the to do lists you have completed and delete them.
